sentences.en: " No, " returned Jessica, " they're poor as church mice. "
sentences.cn: “ 是啊, " 杰西卡回答, " 他们穷得像教堂里的老鼠.

sentences.en: Can you hear the mice squeaking?
sentences.cn: 你听到老鼠吱吱叫 吗 ?

sentences.en: Cats prey on birds and mice.
Cheese is really a good lure for mice.
sentences.cn: 奶酪是很好的引诱老鼠的诱饵.

sentences.en: I don't know how they manage to bring up four children — they're as poor as church mice.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他们如何设法养育4个孩子——他们一贫如洗.

sentences.en: Mice will shred things such as newspapers.
sentences.cn: 老鼠会扯碎报纸一类的东西.

sentences.en: The Hotel has been ordered to close because it is overrun by mice and rats.
sentences.cn: 由于老鼠泛滥成灾，该旅馆被勒令关闭。

sentences.en: The house was completely overrun with mice.
sentences.cn: 这房子简直成了老鼠的天下。

sentences.en: The nest contained eight little mice that were naked and blind.
sentences.cn: 窝里有8只还没长毛、眼睛尚未睁开的小老鼠。

sentences.en: The noun " mouse " is the singular form of " mice " .
sentences.cn: 名词mouse是 mice 的单数形式.

sentences.en: They got a cat to drive out the mice.
sentences.cn: 他们找到一只猫来驱赶老鼠.

sentences.en: Very soon Puss had chased away all the rats and mice.
sentences.cn: 没过多久,普西就吓跑了所有耗子.

sentences.en: We could hear the mice scurrying about in the walls.
sentences.cn: 我们能听见老鼠在墙里乱跑.

sentences.en: We disinfested the kitchen of mice.
sentences.cn: 我们杀灭了厨房的老鼠。

sentences.en: We will have to dispose of the mice in the attic.
sentences.cn: 我们必须消灭阁楼里的老鼠.

sentences.en: We'll have to dispose of the mice in the house .
sentences.cn: 我们得消灭屋里的老鼠。

phrases.tran_cn: 猫戏老鼠；恣意玩弄折磨（像猫对老鼠般）
n. [医]裸鼠；裸小鼠；无毛鼠（指实验室中饲养的老鼠）

trans.tran_cn: 老鼠( mouse的名词复数 )，鼠标，羞怯[胆小]的人，mouse的复数形式
